name: eat to live and live to rob
name_original: eat to live and live to rob
description:
eat to live and live to rob

This game was built during the Jame Gam #26 game jam.

Arts were done by mikoolec and partially by myself.

Music done by spacewolf

The game was built using the P5js library.

Game description

In this game, you are a monster living in a cave near a village. Each night, you go to the village, choose a random villager and decide what you want to do with it: eat it, rob it or leave it in peace.

Every time you eat or rob a villager, that angers the village, the more the village is angry, the higher chance they have to come and kill you.

Your goal is to eat as many villagers as possible in the minimum number of nights. Take care of your hunger, you can not just keep robbing or leaving villagers alive, you have to eat some or else you'll die of hunger.

Shop

There's a shop you can access to buy items to help you. There's 3 items that you can buy:

  • Memory Eraser, it resets the village's anger to 0
  • Darkweb Killer, kills 3 villagers without upping the anger level
  • Chocolate bar, using it fills your hunger bar
Controls

The in-game controls panel is less readable than this one

Action Key Button Leave villager W / ARROW_UP Up Arrow Eat villager A / ARROW_LEFT Left Arrow Rob villager D / ARROW_RIGHT Right Arrow Access / Exit Shop S / ARROW_DOWN Shop Button Access / Exit Help panel H Question Mark Button Buy item 1 - 9 Click on item you want to buy Use item 1 - 9 Click on item you want to use Restart game R Click anywhere Mute / Unmute music M Speaker button
